message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I think it could really benefit your business. Given its value, I'm offering it at $1,100,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I appreciate you countering. That said, $950,000 is a bit too low for me to consider. I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,025,000?
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. I'd be willing to meet you at that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
Bob, I understand your position, but that price point doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $980,000, but that's my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $980,000, but I'm still a bit above $920,000. I'd be willing to meet you at that price, but I'm hoping we can get even closer to my target.
Bob, we're getting close. I'm willing to accept a bit of a compromise to get this deal done. How about $950,000? This is a significant reduction on my part and reflects my desire to work with you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $910,000, which is the lowest I can go.
